ofx:section.ofx:title: SLD Rules
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: The configurations of SLD in the scope of Geoserver is quite static. To dynamically add configurations according the specific domain objects the concept of SLD Rules can be used.

Each rule applies to a specific parameter (and upper and lower bounds) for this parameter and allows the definition of a symbol which will be shown in the map. For legends it's possible to add a label and a description individually for each rule.
The symbol can be configured with a color, a size and one of the available styles summarized in the table.
